channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Hadush Kebatu was jailed for 12 months for touching and trying to kiss a schoolgirl in Epping, UK. His arrest led to a wave of demonstrations outside The Bell Hotel, where he was staying as an asylum seeker from Ethiopia. #Epping #BellHotel #UK #Arrest #P
